snippet: Prime Minister Manuel Valls announced on Friday that there would be harsher punishments for racist acts and increased monitoring of online hate speech.
abstract: French Prime Min Manuel Valls, prompted by deadly attacks on Jews and subsequent increase in anti-Muslim aggression, announces detailed three-year, $108 million plan to combat racism in country.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and AURELIEN BREEDEN

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Manuel Valls announced on Friday that there would be harsher punishments for racist acts and increased monitoring of online hate speech.

headline.main: France Announces Stronger Fight Against Racism and Anti-Semitism
headline.print_headline: France Announces Plan to Fight Racism
